audio_sermons.title: Outline of Song Of Solomon - First 5 Revelations
audio_sermons.description: This book is not about getting people to seek the Lord; it starts with people who are already passionately pursuing Him.  As the Bridegroom opens the eyes of the bride, she sees five things: who He is as Lord, who she is as dark, how she became over involved in men's work, following the true flock, and finding a tremendous liberty with the groom.  Ed Miller shows each revelation how it pertains to our growth in our union with Christ.

audio_sermons.title: Song Of Solomon #1 - Four General Observations About Song Of Solomon
audio_sermons.description: Ed Miller opens the series focusing upon the main themes of the book: a love story in two worlds, the climax of the redemptive experience on the earth, the many comings and goings of the Groom, and the progress of the bride with the Groom.  The heartbeat of Ed's message is your love affair with Jesus, entering into a real experience now of fresh comings of your Bridegroom!  (This series of messages delivered at Del-Mar-Va Men's Retreat in March, 2004).
